Name: Pray for iPhone
Description:
The App that prays to change the world. Share your prayers and pray for other people.

We believe that your iPhone can help you Pray. And now you can also pray from your Apple Watch.

Do you want to pray for people from all over the world? Need thousands of people to pray for your petition? The App that prays to change the world is here!
"Pray" is the application that you're looking for that will help you to pray more.
Download the application that is helping thousands of people! Share your prayers with your followers; pray for people from around the world; meet, chat and join in prayer with thousands of others at the same time; discover your progress with your personal resolutions, and feel part of this community that prays to change the world.

With the “Pray” App you will be able to:
-Send your prayers to thousands of people,
-Pray for people around the world,
-Follow people and accompany them in prayer,
-Add personal resolutions for each day,
-See your weekly progress on your personal resolutions,
-Chat and join in prayer with thousands of people at the same time.

Name: Ask The Guides: Your Daily Boost for the Spirit
Description:
Ask the guides any question about your life and receive inspiration from the oracle. The guides will present you with sacred symbols. Select three to reveal your destiny. 

As you interact with your guides, you will hear their voices speak their wise messages to you. You will also experience beautiful images and music to elevate 
your spirit. 

You aim to succeed in this world. Why take the journey alone? Ask the guides, and they will answer. 


How to best approach the guides:
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
- Read the tutorial on how to best ask the the Guides your question

- Enter your name

- Ask the Guides your question

- Select 3 magic medallions to help guide your answer

- Receive your reading from the Guides

- Share your reading with friends & family or ask the Guides another question


"From ancient times, we have helped and guided you. We whisper wisdom to your heart. We speak in signs and oracles."


Support
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
asktheguides@gmail.com

Name: Covert Alert - Voice Command for Safety
Description:
Covert Alert - Personal Safety in Emergency Situations with Voice Activation
 
Did you know that in the US one person is victimized every 1.6 seconds?
Covert Alert is an emergency app that notifies selected contacts when you are in danger and offers "Safety in Seconds", with No Monthly Subscription Cost. Do not become another statistic!
FEATURES:
- SPEECH ACTIVATION: in an emergency situation you will not have the time to pick up your phone and unlock it, therefore the hands free activation makes it easily usable for activation with user specific keywords or numbers.
- COVERT MESSAGES: when an emergency occurs, the full name of the user will be sent to the designated contacts including the information about the user’s situation.
- REAL TIME GPS: sends the signals to the designated contacts, informing them that the user is in a dangerous situation and is in need of help. This allows tracking of the person using Real Time GPS.
- RECORD THE EMERGENCY: Covert Alert begins recording the events occurring in an emergency situation for a maximum period of 15 minutes. The recording is saved to the user’s local device and a backup is created off the local device for future retrieval if needed.
- CUSTOMIZABLE TEXT MESSAGING: Covert Alert allows the user the ability to customize 2 non-emergency messages, and send those messages to designated contacts without the recording feature in social settings by stating the preset keywords.  
Covert Alert provides 50 free text messages with the initial purchase of the app. Additional text messages may be purchased at any time by the user within Covert Alert.
For more information about Covert Alert including our privacy policies; a complete user guide; additional features; or email addresses and phone numbers for support, visit us at www.covertalert.com, or follow us at facebook.com/covert.alert, or twitter @covertalert.

Covert Alert uses GPS in the background. Note: Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.

Name: Baby Sleep Sounds LITE | white noise for calming
Description:
**Your baby will sleep like angels!**
**Play sound in background, So, you can enjoy your phone!**
**Set your baby's sleep timer! This app will remind to you**
**Choosing playing time!** 
**Soothe your baby to sleep!**
**Fast and simple design!**
**Instant sleep!**

Babies do not have regular sleep cycles until about 6 months of age. While newborns sleep about 16 to 17 hours per day, they may only sleep 1 or 2 hours at a time. As babies get older, they need less sleep. However, different babies have different sleep needs. It is normal for a 6-month-old to wake up during the night but go back to sleep after a few minutes.

If babies are especially fussy or colic, you must to use only this application!

So, we want to help to you about sleeping baby via this application.

You can set timer five,ten,thirty minutes and endless time.

Your baby cries a lot? Can you put a nice sound to calm your baby and sleep like an angel. 
Sounds included in the app:

- Washing machine,
- Hair dryer
- Vacuum cleaner
- Rain
- Ocean waves
- Forest ambiance
- Birds
- Plane interior
- Heartbeat
- Car interior
- Train interior

Name: Jesus. Saves Freely
Description: The Jesus saves app is a place to learn about God, Jesus, and gain hope for life and eternal life.  Check in to see what others have shared on the fan wall.  Tap the call or contact us buttons to get a hold of us anytime to talk.  God came to save, not condemn, He wants us to have a rich life full of joy, and also to lean on Him during the tough times.  God loves you and is here for you, He wants to be your friend.

Name: PlentyFi: Raise money for your urgent needs
Description:
PlentyFi - Raise money for your urgent needs with the help of your friends.

PlentyFi is the place to ask for financial help and get helped. Think of us as your personal fundraising tool that helps you set your savings campaign and invite friends to participate. They help you - you help them. As simple as that.

We’ve helped our clients raise millions of dollars and reach thousands of goals. 
 
It will take you just few moments to register:
- Sign up with Facebook profile
- Link WePay or Stripe account to get contributions from your friends
- Share the goal with your friends

Name: Care for me
Description:
Do you have an intellectual or physical disability or care for someone?  Do you frequently need to explain care routines to numerous carers or friends and family?  

Care for me allows all care requirements to be recorded and reviewed in video, photo or text format categories to provide clear and easily accessible instructions of the cares required.  

.All involved in a person’s care are equally aware of what is required

.Changes in care can be updated quickly and easily 

.Video/photo feature allows cares required to be easily understood

.Calendar to display a day to day timed care plan

.All caring needs are stored together within the one application

.Emergency and safety category for immediate actions required 

.Revision for carers visiting infrequently or emergency respite reference in the case of a carers unexpected absence 

Care for me features:

·  Easy to use

·  Care categories designed to incorporate needs for low to high level 

·  Care needs can be demonstrated via video, photo and text 

·  Calendar to display a day to day timed care plan

·  Password protected to prevent accidental alteration by carers

·  All entries are securely saved by performing an iCloud backup 

·  Available for iPhone and iPad iOS8
